public class ConditionCompound
extends EventCompoundImpl
implements Conditional, Condition

The base conditional event compound deploys itself and, on startup the condition. Evaluation of the condition is left to the childrend created 29-Nov-2006 11:08:41

public ConditionCompound()
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException

java.rmi.RemoteException
Method Detail

isOldNotationSupported

protected boolean isOldNotationSupported()
This is an override point. The original set of event components suppored the 'old' notation, in which actions were listed in the element New subclasses do not need to remain backwards compatible and should declare this fact by returning false from this method

Overrides:
isOldNotationSupported in class EventCompoundImpl
Returns:
false

sfStart

public void sfStart()
             throws SmartFrogException,
                    java.rmi.RemoteException
Starts the component by deploying the condition

Specified by:
sfStart in interface Prim
Overrides:
sfStart in class CompoundImpl
Throws:
SmartFrogException - in case of problems creating the child
java.rmi.RemoteException - In case of network/rmi error

deployConditionAtStartup

protected void deployConditionAtStartup()
                                 throws SmartFrogException,
                                        java.rmi.RemoteException
Override point: where the condition is deployed at startup. The default action is to call deployCondition()

Throws:
SmartFrogException - in case of problems creating the child
java.rmi.RemoteException - In case of network/rmi error

isConditionRequired

protected boolean isConditionRequired()
Override point: is the condition required. IF not, there is no attempt to deploy it at startup

Returns:
true

deployCondition

protected void deployCondition()
                        throws SmartFrogResolutionException,
                               java.rmi.RemoteException,
                               SmartFrogDeploymentException
Deploy the condition.

Throws:
SmartFrogResolutionException - if the condition is required, and it is not there, or the condition itself fails to deploy.
java.rmi.RemoteException - network problems
SmartFrogDeploymentException - deployment problems
See Also:
isConditionRequired()

getCondition

public Condition getCondition()
Get the condition

Returns:
the deployed condition or null if there is none active

evaluate

public boolean evaluate()
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                        SmartFrogException
Evaluate the condition by delegating to the underlying condition. throws an exception if there is no deployed condition.

Specified by:
evaluate in interface Condition
Returns:
true if it is successful, false if not
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - for network problems
SmartFrogException - for any other problem

onEvaluateNoCondition

protected boolean onEvaluateNoCondition()
                                 throws SmartFrogException
Override point. Handle a missing condition

Returns:
the value of the condition.
Throws:
SmartFrogException - throws an exception as there is no deployed condition.

finish

protected void finish()
called after our work is done to trigger termination if the sfTerminate attribute recommends it.
